entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
